### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE Agency (
	agency_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	agency_name VARCHAR(255),
	contact_person VARCHAR(255),
	contact_email VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE Government_Official (
	official_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	official_name VARCHAR(255),
	official_title VARCHAR(255),
	agency_id INT,
	FOREIGN KEY (agency_id) REFERENCES Agency(agency_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Data_Sharing (
	share_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	official_id INT,
	data_shared TEXT,
	share_date DATE,
	FOREIGN KEY (official_id) REFERENCES Government_Official(official_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Waste_Management (
	waste_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	waste_type VARCHAR(255),
	collection_point VARCHAR(255),
	collection_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Policy (
	policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	policy_name VARCHAR(255),
	policy_description TEXT,
	effective_date DATE
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE Agency SET agency_name = 'New Agency Name' WHERE agency_id = 1;
